experience.title: Data Specialist
description: Reduced report execution time by up to 70% by removing extraneous procedures and improving efficiencies in VBA scripts and SQL queries.
Successfully implemented SQL queries to pull data from multiple databases for reports containing information from different departments.
Worked closely with automotive and healthcare stakeholders in developing Excel dashboards to monitor daily KPIs and drive better business decisions.
Solved inconsistencies in reports with outdated procedures by writing documentation that gives clear instructions and context for each process.

experience.title: Quality Control
description: Developed an application to create worksheets for data entry which decreased case review times and prevented accidental overwrites.
Transitioned team over to daily digital reporting rather than submitting paper logs to provide easier and faster access to data and analytics.
Wrote SQL queries to import case-specific data into spreadsheets to increase productivity.

experience.title: Creative Manager
description: Improved site traffic for clients by as much as 100% by creating websites with Search Engine Optimization as a foundational principle.
Consulted with clients to create or redesign websites and other graphic media to meet client expectations and business needs.
